attributes.action: Close schools / colleges during november 2020 lockdown
attributes.additional_details: Allot of students are catching covid-19 from their schools or colleges and then spreading it at home the only way to stop this is to close schools and colleges during the november lockdown.
attributes.background: Close schools / colleges during the november lockdown to stop the spread of Covid-19 trough schools and colleges

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557012
